Token.Abstract: An object which store the data of a downloading image and vends progressive scans *
Returns the latest image based on thresholds, returns nil if no new image is generated

Parameter.Name: blurred
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean to indicate if the image should be blurred

Parameter.Name: maxProgressiveRenderSize
Parameter.Abstract: the maximum dimensions at which to apply a blur. If an image exceeds either the height or width of this dimension, the image will not be blurred regardless of the blurred parameter.

ReturnValue.Abstract: PINImage a progressive scan of the image or nil if a new one has not been generated

Token.Abstract: Returns the current data for the image.

ReturnValue.Abstract: NSData the current data for the image
